original_text: Which all are to perish with the using;) after the commandments and doctrines of men?
korean_text: 이 모든 것은 한때 쓰이고는 없어지리라) 사람의 명령과 가르침을 따르느냐

sentences.original_text: Which all are to perish with the using
sentences.korean_translation: 이 모든 것들은 사용함으로써 멸망하게 될 것들

sentences.original_text: after commandments and doctrines of men?
